summary: ENGINE WOULD JUST SHUT OFF WHILE DRIVING.  WE HAVE TOLD THE CHRYSLER DEALERSHIP ATLAS 3 TIMES THAT THE ENGINE WOULD SHUT OFF MID DRIVING.  THEY ALWAYS TOLD US THEY COULD NEVER FIND FAULT WITH THE VEHICLE AND THAT THERE WAS NOTHING WRONG.  NOW THERE IS A RECALL (R03/NHTSA 14V-73) THAT JUST CAME OUT AND IT'S THE SAME ISSUE.
